scenes.text: Thunder shakes the manor as every candle extinguishes at once. A childlike whisper speaks your names from the second floor.
Portrait eyes track your movement. A hidden drawer opens, revealing a rusted key wrapped in hair.

choices.label: Use the key on the chapel crypt

scenes.text: A music box turns by itself beside a rocking chair that never stops moving. Wet footprints appear behind you one step at a time.

choices.label: Open the music box and follow the lullaby
choices.text: Open the music box and follow the lullaby

choices.label: Run for the chapel before the door shuts
choices.text: Run for the chapel before the door shuts

scenes.text: The chapel mirror fogs from inside, revealing the bound spirit clawing to get out. Candles ignite in a perfect circle around your crew.

choices.label: Shatter the mirror and run below
choices.text: Shatter the mirror and run below

scenes.text: Beneath the manor, an undercroft lined with coffin niches reveals fresh carvings of your own names. One niche is still empty and warm.

choices.label: Relight the mourning candles and continue
choices.text: Relight the mourning candles and continue

choices.label: Seal the crypt and force your way upward
choices.text: Seal the crypt and force your way upward

scenes.text: In the final vault, the spirit speaks with your own voice and offers one bargain: freedom for itself, or peace for the house.

choices.label: Bind it with blood and chain it forever
choices.text: Bind it with blood and chain it forever

scenes.text: The whisper turns into a final sigh. The manor doors unbolt, and moonlight floods the halls for the first time in decades.
The spirit is chained beneath stone and silence. You leave alive, but each of you carries a thin red mark where the oath was sealed.
The vault seals and every candle dies at once. By dawn, only your names remain carved into the manor wall.
